CommandDefinition.Name: requirecapacityforwf
CommandDefinition.Description: Require the specified capacity for the given workflow.

Argument.Name: workflowName
Argument.Description: The name of the workflow for which the capacity will be required

Argument.Name: capacityName
Argument.Description: The name of the capacity that will be required

Argument.Name: cardinality
Argument.Description: The amount of cardinality that will be required
